    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CSVLoggingObserver
    An observer that logs game events to a CSV file.
    CSVQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from a CSV file.
    CSVQuestionLoaderFactory
    A factory class for creating CSVQuestionLoader instances.
    DocxReportStrategy
    Implements the ReportStrategy interface to generate game reports in DOCX format.
    FinishedState
    Represents the finished state of the Jeopardy game.
    GameContext
    The GameContext class manages the overall state and flow of the Jeopardy game.
    GameEvent
    The GameEvent interface represents an event that occurs during the Jeopardy game.
    GameFinishedEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that the Jeopardy game has finished.
    GameObserver
    The GameObserver interface defines the contract for classes that wish to observe and react to game events.
    GameStartedEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a new Jeopardy game has started.
    GameState
    The GameState interface defines the contract for different states within the Jeopardy game.
    InteractiveGameRunner
    The InteractiveGameRunner class is responsible for setting up and running the interactive Jeopardy game.
    IntroState
    The IntroState class represents the initial state of the Jeopardy game.
    JSONQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from a JSON file.
    JSONQuestionLoaderFactory
    A factory class for creating JSONQuestionLoader instances.
    LoadFileEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a question file has been successfully loaded.
    Main
    Main class to start the Jeopardy game.
    ObservableGame
    The ObservableGame class serves as a base for game components that need to notify observers about various game events.
    PdfReportStrategy
    Implements the ReportStrategy interface to generate game reports in PDF format.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Jeopardy game.
    PlayerJoinedEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a player has joined the game.
    PlayingState
    The PlayingState class represents the main gameplay state of the Jeopardy game.
    Question
    Represents a single Jeopardy question, including its category, value, question text, multiple-choice options, correct answer, and whether it has been answered.
    QuestionAnsweredEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a player has answered a question.
    QuestionBoard
    Represents the Jeopardy game board, managing a collection of Questions.
    QuestionLoader
    The QuestionLoader interface defines the contract for classes that are responsible for loading Jeopardy questions from various data sources.
    QuestionLoaderFactory
    An abstract factory class for creating QuestionLoader instances.
    ReportGenerator
    The ReportGenerator class acts as a context for the Strategy design pattern, allowing different report generation strategies (e.g., PDF, DOCX, Text) to be plugged in at runtime.
    ReportStrategy
    The ReportStrategy interface defines the contract for different strategies of generating game reports.
    SelectCategoryEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a player has selected a category.
    SelectPlayerCountEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that the player count has been selected.
    SelectQuestionEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a player has selected a question (by category and value).
    StartGameEvent
    Represents an event indicating the start of a new game.
    TextReportStrategy
    Implements the ReportStrategy interface to generate game reports in plain text format.
    XMLQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from an XML file.
    XMLQuestionLoaderFactory
    A factory class for creating XMLQuestionLoader instances.
